products.name: Cinderella Castle Clock Eco-Drive Watch for Women by Citizen – Limited Edition
products.shortDesc: This original watch face design of this limited edition timepiece was inspired by Cinderella Castle at Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom. Sold exclusively by Disney, our ladies' watch features a goldtone stainless steel case with blue and white dial, and is complemented by the blue leather strap..
products.description: Citizen Eco-Drive technology converts any source of light (natural and artificial) into usable energy. This harnessed energy is then stored in a special power reserve to keep your watch charged and running properly. When fully charged, your Citizen Eco-Drive will continue running—even in total darkness—for at least six months. Properly maintained it will never need another battery. Limited Edition of 500 Stainless steel goldtone case.
